start_msg: I am a Bot created to suggest your posts to [Half-Life Collective](https://t.me/HalfLifeCollective)
language_changed_successfully: The language has been changed successfully.
language_changer_chat: Here you can change the language used for the Bot throughout the chat.
language_changer_private: Here you can change the language used for the Bot in this private chat.
cmds_list_select_category: Please select a category to see the available commands.
cmd_suggestpost_description: Submits your media file for review and publication on Half-Life Collective
cmd_ping_description: Shows the Bot delay to send a message.
cmd_me_description: Shows whether you are a Bot Admin or not.
cmd_ban_user_description: Allows to ban users by ID so they cannot use the Bot.
cmd_unban_user_description: Allows to unblock a user by ID so that they can use the bot again.
cmd_private_not_allowed: This command cannot be used in a private chat. If you need any help, please use the /help command.
sql_exqcuted: SQL executed successfully and without any return.
admin_not_found: User with ID: {id} was not found in the Admin list!
user_notfound: User with ID: {id} was not found in the Banned list!
banned_msg: You are not allowed to use this command!
